intro: This release adds two new services, fixes Google Translate, adds a text manipulation option, and fixes some minor bugs.
notes: adds Youdao Dictionary service (thanks Lou Shi)
fixes Google Translate again (thanks effective4english, Glutanimate, leo-one, SauloSilva)
option to use human-readable filenames (thanks george84, turgutbekil, szpak)
users can change newlines in their input text into ellipses (thanks noinkling)
